meanings.sent1: The blesboks grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of blesboks while on safari.
meanings.sent3: The blesboks decided to have a dance party in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The blesboks moved gracefully, like dancers on a stage.
meanings.sent5: The blesboks' white faces stood out against the green grass.

meanings.sent1: The blesboks ran swiftly across the savanna.
meanings.sent2: Have you ever seen a blesboks up close?
meanings.sent3: The blesboks wore sunglasses to look cool.
meanings.sent4: The blesboks leaped through the air like acrobats.
meanings.sent5: The blesboks' horns curved elegantly on their heads.

meanings.definition: Blesboks: pertaining to or characteristic of blesbok
meanings.sent1: The blesboks fur was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She wore a blesboks-inspired outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: The blesboks-themed cake was a hit at the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: His eyes had a blesboks-like intensity when he was focused.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in a blesboks color palette of brown and white.
